entry.content:
Install Pelican

mkdir myblog
cd myblog
virtualenv venv -p python2
source venv/bin/activate
pip install pelican markdown tzlocal typogrify fabric

Create Base Skeleton

pelican-quickstart

Welcome to pelican-quickstart v3.7.1.

This script will help you create a new Pelican-based website.

Please answer the following questions so this script can generate the files needed by Pelican.


> Where do you want to create your new web site? [.]
> What will be the title of this web site? demo
> Who will be the author of this web site? author
> What will be the default language of this web site? [en] zh
> Do you want to specify a URL prefix? e.g., http://example.com   (Y/n) Y
> What is your URL prefix? (see above example; no trailing slash) http://example.com
> Do you want to enable article pagination? (Y/n) Y
> How many articles per page do you want? [10] 5
> What is your time zone? [Asia/Shanghai]
> Do you want to generate a Fabfile/Makefile to automate generation and publishing? (Y/n) Y
> Do you want an auto-reload & simpleHTTP script to assist with theme and site development? (Y/n) Y
> Do you want to upload your website using FTP? (y/N) N
> Do you want to upload your website using SSH? (y/N) N
> Do you want to upload your website using Dropbox? (y/N) N
> Do you want to upload your website using S3? (y/N) N
> Do you want to upload your website using Rackspace Cloud Files? (y/N) N
> Do you want to upload your website using GitHub Pages? (y/N) y
> Is this your personal page (username.github.io)? (y/N) y
Done. Your new project is available at /Users/stamaimer/Workspace/myblog.bk

Create Article

vim content/hello-world.md
Title: Hello, World
Date: Mon Oct  2 23:44:54 CST 2017

Hello, World.

fab build
fab serve

Modify Theme

cd venv/lib/python2.7/site-packages/pelican/themes/notmyidea/templates

vim article.html
move {% include 'article_infos.html' %} to the below of {{ article.content }}
remove <h2>Comments !</h2>

vim article_infos.html
remove author information

vim base.html
add cdn of font awesome
modify footer

vim index.html
move {{ article.content }} to the left of {% include 'article_infos.html' %}
remove comments information

Settings

vim pelicanconf.py
set SITEURL = "http://127.0.0.1:8000"
set LINKS
set SOCIAL
set GITHUB_URL = "https://github.com/username"
set DISQUS_SITENAME = "username"
set TWITTER_USERNAME = "username"
set DEFAULT_DATE_FORMAT = "%a %m-%d-%Y"
set SUMMARY_MAX_LENGTH = 100
set DISPLAY_PAGES_ON_MENU = False
set DEFAULT_CATEGORY = "Msic"

vim puslishconf.py
add LINKS after SITEURL
set DELETE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY = False
